title.narrative: Promoting innovative financing options, including Public-Private Partnerships (PPPs), to finance energy efficiency projects and help move Mexico to a low carbon economy

description.narrative: Programme designed to foster the transition to a low-carbon economy, in the context of the Mexican energy reform, through the implementation of energy efficiency projects in areas related to health, education and/or other strategic public services using innovative contracting mechanisms such as Public Private Partnerships (PPPs) to increase green private investment. This project will also improve the Mexican economy and social welfare by boosting productivity and helping state governments to overcome budgetary constraints. The pilot project is to be implemented in benefit of the Jalisco's State Government. Carbon Trust's list of trusted technology providers will bring opportunities for UK and other businesses to enter this sector.
